product_name: CygoLite Dash 320 USB Front Bike Light
long_description: Featuring a dedicated safety mode for daytime rides, the Cygolite Dash 320 USB Front Bike Light illuminates your way with 320 lumens. When it's time to recharge just plug it into the nearest USB port.
short_description: Featuring a dedicated safety mode for daytime rides, the Cygolite Dash 320 USB Front Bike Light illuminates your way with 320 lumens. When it's time to recharge just plug it into the nearest USB port.
